text: Kris Jenner'has known for years'that her husband Bruce wanted to become a woman, it has been claimed. A source close to the Jenner family told TMZ that the Kardashians are lying by claiming they knew nothing about his plans. According to the report, Kris has known Bruce'had issues with his sexual identity'for decades, and that his intention to have a sex change came to light years ago. Scroll down for video... Not letting on : Kris Jenner - pictured with Bruce here in Beverly Hills in 2012 - is said to have'known for years'about him wanting to become a woman, according to a new report by TMZ But the Kardashian matriarch supposedly demanded it was kept private because it would'hurt the brand '.
